reviewText: The Historical Critical Method has had a huge impact on our understanding of Judaism and Christianity.  Islam has not yet gone through the process of applying critical scrutiny to the text of the Qur'an.  Ms. Manji's attempt to revive the tradition ot "itjihad" for the study of Islam is a helpful step in that direction.  My favorite parts of the documentary are the conversations she has with her more traditional mother.  Her interview with a former associate of Osama Bin Laden is also fascinating.
